newsitem.title: USA: BPA leaves Friday surplus power prices unchanged.
newsitem.headline: BPA leaves Friday surplus power prices unchanged.

text.p: The Bonneville Power Administration (BPA) left prices for surplus power delivered on Friday unchanged, the agency said Thursday.

BPA continued to offer non-firm power for hours ending at 0600 and 2300 PT at $9.50 per megawatt hour (MWh) for both Northwest and California-Oregon border (COB) deliveries, while delivered prices for hours ending 0100-0500 and 2400 were flat at $9.00.
Firm power during off-peak hours on Friday was also unchanged at $9.00 per MWh for all deliveries.
